name: white-flute
effect: Used outside of battle : Doubles the wild Pokémon encounter rate.
short_effect: Doubles the wild Pokémon encounter rate.

flavor_text.black_white: A toy flute made from white glass. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A toy flute made from white glass. A maniac will buy it for a high price.
